content.raw:
The "about point" must also be specified for completeness \(otherwise we could have completely different numbers\).  
Looking at the source code it'd seem this is with respect to the center of mass?

If that's the case I'd suggest this reading as: "Returns the mass matrix computed about the center of mass of the link it corresponds to and expressed in the inertial frame of that link"
